participant_1.background:
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
i ride a motorcycle , but its not a harley.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
i cook every night.
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.

participant_2.background:
My grandkids love to go to the park with me and we always have a great time running around and playing on the swings.
i do not consume caffeine.
i used to follow the grateful dead when they toured.
I miss my motorcycle and wish I could still have it, but I'm happy with my car.
I think taking my kids to car shows and museums would be a great way to share my passion for cars with them.

content.text: Hey! I think it would be great if we shared our favorite things.
Hey there! I'd love to hear about your favorites.
I love to cook and I ride a motorcycle. I also love to relax on my comfy couch with a bowl of pistachio ice cream. What about you?

I love to go to the park with my grandkids and I don't consume caffeine. I used to follow the Grateful Dead when they toured and I miss my motorcycle. I think taking my kids to car shows and museums would be a great way to share my passion for cars with them.

That's so cool! I've always wanted to see the Grateful Dead live. I love going to parks with my family too. It's so nice to spend time with them. I have to say I'm a little jealous of your motorcycle! I've always wanted one but I don't have the time to ride it.
I'm glad you like my favorites! I'm sure you'll get a motorcycle someday. It's a lot of fun to ride
